summary: This is an internal email or memo from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, detailing the timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's status and supervision from July 23-30, 2019. It notes his transfer to psych observation and the use of an inmate companion, sent by an Associate Warden.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose status and supervision at MCC New York is being detailed, including his transfer to psych observation.

persons.name: Associate Warden MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of this memo/email detailing Epstein's status and supervision timeline at the correctional facility.

connections.description: The Associate Warden is responsible for reporting on the supervision and status of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Inmate Companion Assumes Duties
events.description: An inmate companion assumed supervision duties for Jeffrey Epstein from staff at 7:00 AM.

events.title: Epstein Transferred to Psych Observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was transferred to psych observation at 8:45 AM, where an inmate companion was utilized.

events.title: Psych Observation Period Ends
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's period in psych observation ended at 8:15 AM.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was under the supervision of an inmate companion from July 23-24, 2019.
Epstein was transferred to psych observation on July 24, 2019, at 8:45 AM.
The psych observation period lasted until July 30, 2019, at 8:15 AM.
This internal memo was sent by an Associate Warden at MCC New York on August 12, 2019.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY case files.
